requirement: This code is intended to implement a dual-axis reset functionality with status monitoring and error handling for two motion control axes.
provide_code:
FUNCTION_BLOCK FB_DualAxisReset
VAR_INPUT
	Axis1			:	AXIS_REF;			//轴1引用
	Axis2			:	AXIS_REF;			//轴2引用
	bExecute		:	BOOL;				//执行复位信号
END_VAR
VAR_OUTPUT
	bDone			:	BOOL;				//复位完成
	bBusy			:	BOOL;				//复位进行中
	bError			:	BOOL;				//错误标志
END_VAR
